    • Method Detail

      • getWePoints

        protected org.bukkit.Location[] getWePoints(org.bukkit.entity.Player pl)
        Generates an array of locations with length 2, containing endpoints of a player's CuboidSelection
        Parameters:
        pl - Player to check WorldEdit data for.
        Returns:
        An array of length 2 containing the minimum point, maximum point data for a player if they have a CuboidSelection. Null otherwise.

      • weVectorToLocation

        protected org.bukkit.Location weVectorToLocation(org.bukkit.World world,
                                                 com.sk89q.worldedit.math.BlockVector3 blockVector3)
        Generates a spigot Location object from a WorldEdit BlockVector3 object
        Parameters:
        world - The Spigot-defined world the selection is in
        blockVector3 - The WorldEdit vector to convert
        Returns:
        A spigot-defined Location object with points from blockVector3

      • getLocationString

        protected java.lang.String getLocationString(org.bukkit.Location lc)
        Creates a formatted string of Location data
        Parameters:
        lc - The location data from which a string will be created.
        Returns:
        The formatted string.

      • processCommand

        public abstract void processCommand(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                                    java.lang.String[] args)
        Processes the command passed to it
        Parameters:
        sender - The CommandSender object that originally sent the command.
        args - The arguments passed with the command - doesn't include the "tpp [command type]" in command. That's implied by the implementing object. Ex: /tpp protected add PrimaryProtected PrimaryLost You can't do that here, String args[] would have {add PrimaryProtected PrimaryLost You can't do that here}.

      • addRegion

        protected abstract void addRegion(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                                  java.lang.String[] truncatedArgs)
        Performs all region adding actions, including adding the region to memory and disk.
        Parameters:
        sender - The CommandSender that ran the command.
        truncatedArgs - A truncated list of arguments passed with the addRegion command. For command /tpp lostandfound add PrimaryLost, this includes only PrimaryLost

      • removeRegion

        protected abstract void removeRegion(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                                     java.lang.String[] truncatedArgs)
        Performs all region removing actions, including removing the region from memory and disk.
        Parameters:
        sender - The CommandSender that ran the command.
        truncatedArgs - A truncated list of arguments passed with the addRegion command. For command /tpp lostandfound remove PrimaryLost, this includes only PrimaryLost

      • listRegions

        protected abstract void listRegions(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                                    java.lang.String[] truncatedArgs)
        Lists regions to sender in chat. If args[0] is specified, it will only list that LostAndFoundRegion's data
        Parameters:
        sender - The CommandSender that ran the command.
        truncatedArgs - A truncated list of arguments passed with the addRegion command. For command /tpp lostandfound list PrimaryLost, it would include PrimaryLost.
